name: Spring awakening
description:
Join the TDF Spring toddlers and come to play and Kick-Off the Spring Season together!

Come and see our new garden, the baby food forest, our reforestation area, the soon-to-re-wild land, our Sauna, tree-house, our glampings, and our funky vibes of course.

Let's find ourself in a land of joy and dreams!

Program:

Friday:
Spring opening sunset meditation
Meaning, productivity and fun, how do we merge them together?
Sauna

Saturday:
9: breakfast
11: helophyte planting 
14: Lunch Picnic in the High-grasses
16: Funky co-creation vibes
18: sunset set

Sunday:
Brunch all morning
Closing Circle
Departures

name: Ecstatic Gardening
description:
Dearest friends, gardeners, dancers, weeders and beyond,

TDF is building its first large-scale veggie garden! We invite you for a nearly-Spring weekend celebration of food, life, and land.

ü•¶BUILD A VEGGIE GARDEN from bare ground to planted food (Sat. + Sun. morning)
ü©∞ECSTATIC DANCE with Momo (Saturday afternoon)
ü•µSAUNA on the hill
üé™OPEN SPACE for your own workshops, offerings, creations
+ üë®‚Äçüíª FOOD FOREST GENERATOR demo from complexearth.com

Enter the body and land-connection mode. The seeds of late summer are sprouting and it‚Äôs time to prepare beds for them to grow strong and tasty! üå±
By end of summer, we aim to be feeding 30 people 100% of their vegetables at TDF.

We will feast on delicious food, build beds and plant veggies with the guidance and knowledge of experienced farmers (10+ years). Ecstatic dance with Momo our brilliant guide, and exchange in an open space to offer your own gifts and experiments. 

Plan your arrival for Friday at 16:00. If you are coming only on Saturday, arrive by 9:00 for the opening circle. More information will follow in the days before the event.
Closing circle at 18:00 on Sunday.

üì≤Detailed program schedule to follow on Telegram (link in the ticket confirmation email).

Let‚Äôs grow this garden!

‚ö†Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è Bring warm clothes! We've not quite arrived at installing the heated floors and nights here are chilly. We supply duvets for glampers. ‚ùÑÔ∏è‚ö†Ô∏è

üêë We are building TDF. Your contribution facilitates our operations and brings the vision to the ground! üêë‚Äã‚Äã

name: 2022 REVIEW & HOLIDAY PARTY
description:
Once again we get together to celebrate the eventful year that is coming to an end! 
Calling all friends and family to join us on this date!
Came as you are (with your ugly sweater or not) and bring your joyful spirit. That's it. 
baaaaaaaa üéä‚ùÑÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è

name: TDF X CREW HASSAN
description: A get together celebrating everything that TDF has become this year.

name: WEEKEND PLAY DAYS ü§∏üèΩ
description:
Heya!

We like to host our friends at our home, so we invite you over for the weekend üí´
TDF is both a play and resting ground with gentle hills and winding oaks.

Let's be together!
üí¶ SWEAT and cold-dunk with the wood-fire sauna
ü©∞ DANCE with Mike Stellar (DJ)
ü•ò Cook and eat delicious FOOD
üå± Plant in the garden; care for the baby trees
üå≥ CLIMB the big trees!
ü§π‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Share spontaneous WORKSHOPS
ü¶ó Wild GRASSHOPPER sound healing (upon grasshopper consent)
‚ú® Visit our friends at Azula market on Sunday (if we have enough modes of transportation)

üè† Come for the day or sleep here for the night. All meals included! 
Also, take the "Weekend + A Week" ticket to drop in for longer and work on some of our projects on the ground: helophyte greywater filter, food forest care, native reforestation.

See ya!
Bea, Ale, Joshua, Juliana, Dylan & the sheep

name: Ecstatic Forestry (Dreamy Planting II)
description:
Hi friends üêë

Seasoned foresters, nature loving hippies, ReFi pirates & ecstatic dancers collide in a fusion of PRAGMATIC ECSTATIC REFORESTING!!!

üå≤ PLANTING 600+ TREES (Sat + Sun)
ü©∞ ECSTATIC DANCE (Sat evening)
üßô AGROFORESTRY discussion panel (Sat afternoon)
‚ö™Ô∏è OPEN SPACE - bring your offerings (Sun. After lunch)

Enter the body and land-connection mode. Seeds are falling and Fall is the season to plant. üå± In October, we extended our fruit forest and planted around 1000 trees. 
During November, we want to invite you to plant 600+ more trees in a little corner of our beautiful land that we started to re-wild last year.

Come and join us - we will feast with delicious skillfully prepared food, plant trees with skillful gjuidance of experienced agroforesters, ecstatic dance and exchange in open space to offer your own gifts (could be a ReFi talk, a craft, yoga class or a armpit farting session!).

Plan your arrival for Friday at 16:00 or if you are coming only on Saturday, arrive at 9:00. More information will follow the days before the event. 
Closing circle at 18:00 on Sunday.
Detailed program schedule to follow on Telegram.

What do you say?

üßô Including you, there are some special guests who will share their experiences and gifts with us. They are:

üíÉ Momo - Ecstatic Dance Guide
Momo serves his purpose of connecting people to their Heart through Sound Healing, Inner Child Activation, Embodied Heart Connection (a practice he developed which combines Movement, Conscious Intimacy and Breathwork), through creating deep Ecstatic Dance journeys and through Sacred Cacao Ceremonies.

üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Elisa - Massage Therapist
Elisa is a therapist, traveler and activist.
As an Ayurvedic Yoga Massage practitioner, her mission is to bring physical, emotional and energetic rebalance through the power of her hands. The therapy combines deep tissue techniques with assisted yoga stretches and energetic point stimulation.

üå≥ Lars Wild - Student of Nature (Agroforestry)
Lars‚Äô work is inspired by syntropic agriculture and he has attended several workshops with Ernst Gotsch. He has been working for seven years in the challenging dry land of Alentejo. He carries extensive knowledge of the species and methods that work best in Portugal to grow healthy food production systems within a natural forest ecosystem and restore our natural place within the macrocosm.

üå≥ Denise Mansbart - Co-creator with Lars Wild
Denise has been apprenticing with Lars Wild since February and brings the fresh and necessary perspective of the beginner‚Äôs mind to our forestry discussion. Denise worked for a reforestation charity in the UK which buys and reforests degraded farmland.

üå≥ Andr√© Antunes - RegenAg, Agroecology Advisor and Senior Farmer Liaison Manager for Europe
Born and raised in Portugal from families closely tied with agriculture, Andr√© consults in Regenerative Agriculture in Portugal. He works with the Savory Institute and Climate Farmers. He travels Europe deepening his knowledge of topics including Scalable Agroforestry, Social Economics, Indigenous Knowledge, and Art & Literature in Agriculture.

üå≥ Adam Posthuma - Farmer & Ecological Consultant
Adam is a sustainable development and regenerative agriculture consultant. He started working  working with permaculture design and regenerative and organic agriculture 10 years ago and specializes in vegetable production, agroforestry, reforestation and water and energy systems. He studied Biology and mastered in Sustainable Land Use, Environment and Biodiversity.

üêë We are building TDF. Your contribution facilitates our operations and brings the vision to the ground! üêë

name: Dreamy Planting Action
description:
We have a beautiful land to care for, many many TREES, three BIRTHDAYS, live MUSIC! DANCE music! and delicious FOOD. Gooood vibes! It's a planting action, a birthday party, old friends and new friends!

Come and join us for two nights of celebrating autumn, rain and planting
üçÅüåûüå≥üå≤üå≥üå≤üå≥üå≤ 1,600 TREES & SHRUBS üå≥üå≤üå≥üå≤üå≥üå≤üåûüçÅ

üçÉ WORKSHOPS on natural cycles and Live Concert from Freeman
üíÉ DANCE DANCE MUSIC from Alex Doering üéß https://on.soundcloud.com/JHYns

Additionally, expect a little workshop about what we're actually doing with our fruit forest, an introduction to Traditional Dream Factory and Oasa and loads of music, food & dance.

SPECIAL THANKS AND KUDOS TO: TDF land circle, members and friends for preparing the land and soil for us to plant, Philippe Birker for gifting us this entire idea and Oliver Goshy from the Regenerative Skills Podcast for helping us design this little piece of our dreamland. 

Yay, see ya!

ticketOptions.name: DAY TICKET - Saturday
ticketOptions.disclaimer: Arrive at 08:30, plant rest connect and dance with us. You're covered with lunch and dinner :)

ticketOptions.name: WEEKEND TICKET - Subsidised
ticketOptions.disclaimer:
This ticket's cost is catered to those who can't afford the real-cost weekend contribution to make the planting action go live.  We want to support locals and people in a precarious situation - hopefully soon they'll be in a place where they can support someone else's participation.

Arrive Friday and stay with us until Sunday afternoon. Delicious food included. 

Preferably bring your own tent, sleeping bag and sleeping mattress (come equipped, it gets COLD!). We really want to make this event affordable for all, and nevertheless will give Glamping preference to those who can support the Standard and Sponsor tickets. BUT! If you don't have camping gear or would really be better off with Glamping, let us know and we will accommodate :)

Bring towels for sauna and shower! And organic soap (we use water from showers to water trees!).

Bring towels for the sauna and shower! And organic soap (we use water from showers to water trees!).

name: Saturday Playground at TDF
description:
Join us for a day of co-created playful art wizardry. Bring your favourite art supplies and get ready to play with us in a magickal space in Alentejo!

üêâ‚ú®üé©

This time, we're going for artsy, chilled and cosy vibes in a small-ish group. There's a possibility to join a few spontaneous activities such as:

- Animal Moves with Dylan
- Fearless Drawing with Silvia
- Co-created Zine Making with Michal

And, of course, a good old Evening Boogie in the Land with DJ Ectoplasm.

üí•

btw, if you want to bring a workshop / game - we'd love to hear from you. TDF is a factory of dreams - let's make yours a reality!

ps. There's a possibility of staying for the night -> book the overnight ticket.

name: Village Builders Open Day üå≥
description:
10 September at the Traditional Dream Factory
Option to stay an extra day to connect and play in our regenerative playground.

üå≥

We‚Äôre bringing builders of regenerative villages together to create a book compiling patterns, tools, and processes to encourage building regenerative villages worldwide.

During the Open Day the co-authors will present the first prototype of the book and ask for your feedback.

Join us to ask difficult and/or ‚Äústupid‚Äù questions, uncover missing areas, clarify the most important takeaways, and connect with fellow regenerators in the magickal Factory of Dreams, where everything is possible.

Whether you‚Äôre already building a village, or are at the very beginning of your regenerative journey we are looking forward to meeting you!

‚ú®

Schedule:

10 September (Saturday) - OPEN DAY

- 8.30 Breakfast / Arrivals
- 10.00 - 12.30 Regenerative Villages Intro
- 13.00 Lunch
- 14.00 - 17.00 Regenerative Village Workshop
- 19.30 Dinner
- Evening Connection & Play Time

Regeneration is not just about the Land, but also ourselves. Stay for an extra day to connect and play with us!

11 September (Sunday) - PLAY DAY

- 9.00 Breakfast 
- 10.30 - 12.30 Connecting / Play
- 13.00 Lunch
- 14.00 - 18.00 Connecting / Play
- 19.30 Dinner
- Departures

Note: TDF will be closed for guests from the 12th of September until the end of the month.

‚ô•Ô∏è

Map: https://bit.ly/find-tdf

name: The LOVESHIP
description:
Hi friends ü§∏üèΩ

If you have arrived here, you know what the shebang is about. The coven gathers in the land where dreams are alive, the Traditional Dream Factory. Let‚Äôs remind ourselves of why we are so precious - to ourselves and to each other. Let's share our projects, our gifts and skills, our challenges and successes. Let's listen and talk with each-other and rock life together. And let‚Äôs have some fun üï∫ fun ü§∏üèΩ¬†fun üßöüèΩ¬†Who doesn't love a lil classik rave or a no-talent dinner show? All of this whilst, of course, caring for our mama planet, connecting with the terra that holds us üå±

Let‚Äôs keep it easy and simple. We all know the deal, we just need to show up and be. Meals will be cooked together and in case you have a workshop or a gift you would like to share, you can ping Josh or Bea. We have a little thread to guide our days but we also want to make it fluid and open to y‚Äôall. These days will be a mix or intentional emotional and physical expression and rest. It‚Äôs a wholesome retreat. You can expect to have a lot of free time to wonder, sleep, play and chat. 

The tickets include accommodation, food and drinks. Creatures contributing to the program get a lower-cost ticket as a sign of appreciation. We tried to keep costs as low as possible, and there is nevertheless a buffer value just in case. During our days together we will decide how to spend that money (if there will be any left). 

In case you cannot afford The Loveship PLEASE REACH OUT. We have some money from old Treehouse days that we thought could be used for this moment :) 

If you have any questions, check the FAQ at https://tinyurl.com/2j4ds4zr and if they remain -> Bea or Josh. 

Sending y‚Äôall much love and looking forward to seeing you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

üé™ Stay with us at TDF before or after The Loveship!! Let us know you're coming with the 'BOOKING FORM' at the top of this Visitor's Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/198vWYEQCC1lELQa8f76Jcw3l3UDiPcBKt04PGFKnUvg/edit

‚ÑπÔ∏è üé• DOCUMENTATION NOTICE: We'll take video and photos during this event to provide memories when we're older and wiser. You won't be photographed if you don't want to be. You can let us know your needs through a form in the Participation Guide which you'll receive with your ticket :)

name: Abela Art Faire
description:
Traditional Dream Factory (TDF) invites you to participate in the first Abela Art Faire, bringing together art, NFTs (non-fungible tokens) and land regeneration.

Whether you are already familiar with the world of NFTs and web3 or not, we welcome  you to partake in a weekend filled with discussions, workshops, play and curiosity about the future of art in light of these technologies. During the Art Faire TDF will become a fiat-less space meaning no physical, government-provided currencies are used. All transactions are made on the blockchain.

Our weekend includes:
-intriguing installations
-workshops and panel discussions
-good food
-scavenger hunts
-dance & music
-cacao ceremony & body painting
-a possibility to co-create in our summer playground!

If you are an artist, and want to display your art (both physical or digital) we offer discounts on tickets. Please contact ritaspalma.14@gmail.com
There will be a possibility to learn how to turn your art into NFT to sell digitally. 

We hope to see you there!

Friday
1000 gates open
Throughout the morning: Open ceremony 
1300 Lunch
1500 Collaborative canvas 
1900 Dinner
2030 Cacao Art ceremony 

Saturday 
0800 yoga
0930 Breakfast
1100 NFT workshop (bring your computer for this)
1300 Lunch
1500 Panel Discussion 
1900 Dinner
2030 DJ Francisco Preto

Sunday 
0800 Breathwork 
0930 Breakfast
1200 Abela Open day 
1300 Lunch
1500 Workshop papier march√©
1900 Dinner
2030 Kombucha bar

name: Playground Saturday
description:
At TDF we take play very seriously.

In fact, we started a new tradition where we use every Saturday's to play, to build, to grow, to experience and do whatever we feel called to doing.

Now every last Saturday of the Month we are opening our doors to let anyone join the celebration - so come play with us!

Program content will be losely co-created with what each participant wishes to bring - but some example things we bring:
- cacao ceremony
- touch of light (https://touchoflight.space/)
- collaborative drawings
- DJ sets / dancing
- breathwork
- building swings / treehouses / art
- ...
- what's your dream?

Feel free to bring your favorite toys & snacks.
We will have refreshments available at the bar at a small fee. 

üéâüêë

If you want to stay overnight, book via our Visitors Guide:
https://bit.ly/3n0ndTD

name: TDF Monthly Community CALL üìû
description:
Hi friends!
Spring is blossoming and we looking forward to connecting with you and checking what's rolling. 
We'll talk about what stewards have been up to on the ground, circles on the clouds and reserve some space for mingling with each other and digital cuddles.

See you soon üî•

name: HEART : MAGIKA
description:
A Festival Retreat for the community by the community with a special purpose: to build sanctuary together.

Project Heart ‚ù§Ô∏èÔ∏è ( https://www.instagram.com/project) 
&
Magika üîÆ (https://www.instagram.com/magika.fm)

>>>joining forces in our dear Traditional Dream Factory in order to create a community retreat. Here we prepare a fertile ground to explore the advantages of being part of a community by experiencing it. Our goal as a nomadic temporary tribe is to make a sanctuary!

All guests are welcome to co-create the program. Adding up flavor to the menu. In this 5 days long experience we are going to heal, learn, explore, dance & celebrate together!
5 days & 4 nights including food, full program & a beach party

Camping
355.‚Äì ‚Ç¨
Vans
385.‚Äì ‚Ç¨
Quatro Glamping Tipi
450.‚Äì ‚Ç¨
Duo Glamping Tipi
550.‚Äì ‚Ç¨

Event curated by TDF's spring stewards, David & Ani

name: Blossom into Spring with Ayurveda
description:
How are you feeling these days? Vibrant, happy, and full of energy? Or fatigued, dull, moody, and stressed out? How you feel is linked with your body‚Äôs ability to detoxify and rejuvenate on a daily basis. Ancient wisdom has it that exactly at the juncture of seasons (fall and spring), the chance to develop imbalance and disease is great, and it is a perfect opportunity to (re-)align yourself with nature and boost the body‚Äôs innate self-repair system.

During this mini-retreat - facilitated by Ulli Allmendinger, MSc Ayurveda - we will start our days with some movement accompanied by special aromatic blends, followed by lectures, demos, herbal tonics, and shared Ayurvedic meals together. The highlight will be our Sunday afternoon herbal hike in the Portuguese countryside, enjoying the blossoms as well as learning about various medicinal local herbs and flowers.

In this weekend - retreat, you will learn how to:

‚Ä¢ Navigate spring season according to Ayurveda

‚Ä¢ Balance the sluggish and heavy Kapha energy in body and mind

‚Ä¢ Cleanse the liver for better energy and fat metabolism

‚Ä¢ Lose excess weight effortlessly

‚Ä¢ Re-set your eating habits & beat sugar and coffee cravings

‚Ä¢ Taste delicious detox tonics

‚Ä¢ Make a personal oil blend to take with you

For more info please visit 
https://www.ulli-ayurveda.com/en/teaching/retreats/blossom-into-spring

To register, please email 
bige.ergez@gmail.com

name: TDF Community Call üìû
description:
Hi dreamers üí≠ 
Spring has arrived and we have already re-opened our beautiful TDF on the ground. It's now time to revamp our online rituals, bring us all together in the digital worlds and share about what has been rolling üå±
Let's meet every last Tuesday of each month, from 7-8PM GMT to dream and share about what's rolling in our dreamship üöÄ

THIS TUESDAY 29th of March, we'll talk about:
- Events coming up üéà
- The legal structure and tokenomics we've been crafting for TDF during the winter months üñå
- Proposals review

Looking forward to seeing you soon ü§∏üèΩ

name: TDF Call: Spring Visits Q&A
description:
Hello friends ü§∏üèΩ 
Spring is arriving and with it, our lovely Dream Factory is opening its doors!! Wop wop! üåàüî•üéà
We are hosting a little community call for those who want to visit in the next couple of months. Hop into the call if would you like to know:
- How to sign up for your visit!
- What is currently happening on the ground these days.
- How you can contribute during your stay.

And! To tell us all about you and what dreams you would like to turn true during your stay üí≠
See you soon üíõ

Hop in here: https://meet.google.com/ziv-zghg-hiu

name: TDF virtual holiday partayyyy ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥ü•≥
description:
Hoo hooo hooo!!! 
It's the time of the year to learn if the dreamers have been naughty or nice!! 

Join us on Dec 21st to celebrate Winter Solstice, the end of the year at TDF and each other. 
Get a glass of wine and put on the party outfit! 
We will be sharing with you the progress we've done at TDF in 2021 and a sneak peak into what's coming next!

name: re:encrypt  - Immersion weekend
description:
Immersion weekend at TDF FROM 19-21 of November
Next to the Hackaton pitches, during this weekend we are going on an Unconference style journey on DAOS. There are prompts for workshops on Tokenising Communities & Property, Decentralised Governance, Finances & NFTs, Blockchain and Smart Contracts. Do you want to offer any of these? Do you have some other things you would like to contribute with? Parallel to all these, there will be a tree planting action on sight (yes, we will get our hands dirty) and please pack your funkiest party-clothes for a little boogie boogie sessh. 

Fill up this form if you want to contribute or share ideas: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScsmKm0m8ozv5X-EkTbVDgvs1laFp5jgvX2XnTdGAihfRXXNQ/viewform

Submit a booking request: https://airtable.com/shruhOwVE3vx4RiD3

name: Primal Gathering
description:
Super excited to let you know we are hosting another magical event at Traditional Dream Factory üáµüáπ 

Primal Gathering 
www.primalgathering.co

12-14th of NOV üå≥ planting 1000 trees together ‚ù§ 

Apart from reforestation, Primal Gathering also creates space for yoga, music, art, natural dying, herbalism & more üêûüôå

You have a 10% off using TDF2021 as a discount code: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/primal-reforestation-gathering-traditional-dream-factory-tickets-186721538147

name: re:encrypt
description: A month focused on crypto /blockchain themed around decentralized organizations and products, with hands on developement plus some side fun activities: planting a forest... Join the telegram group to find out more and get to know about specific events during this month. https://t.me/joinchat/GLo4YSY2mZRlNmRh

name: Lupin' Party
description:
Broadcasting lupines on our barren hill. A flowering ground cover planted beneath the lupine plant helps keep roots cool and will benefit from the nitrogen in the soil, creating a showy display in the landscape.

+ we might be loopin' in some beats too!

name: Entelechy
description:
An immersive experience that's part living lab and part co-created retreat where we align with nature and our nature to create an organic growth ecosystem for being, relating, and creating regeneratively.

You will learn and try out: self-awareness and introspection practices, communication and communal living models,  and regenerative systems design tools and projects.

You will connect with: yourself, your body, each other, and experts who will blow your mind. 

By the end, you'll walk away with a community of humans ready to live better, and a plan and tools to take this back to your life. Learn more here. 

Applications (on the website bellow) close Oct. 13!

name: Touch of Light
description:
Your eyes were closed, but you needed no eyes to see. Your vision was awoken. You got caught in a net of dreams. Your body was tense but you let it go - and gained a new sense of calmness.
An experience that combines breathwork, light frequencies and sounds to make you reconnect with your body üå¨üõ∏üé∂

Alter your state. From wakefulness to dreams. Just let your mind drift.

name: TDF community call - PiNK PAPER co-creation
description: Join our calls every other Sunday to get engaged with the process of creating Traditional Dream Factory - the first location in Portugal - an evolutionary experiment for living and #creating together!
